de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config
Interface ISysConfigManager

All Superinterfaces:
ISysComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyISysConfigManager
public interface ISysConfigManager
extends ISysComponent

This is the base for all configuration managers. It can hold one or more different configurations which can be retrieved with the get methods.

To handle different configurations at the same time every configuration needs a unique name. This name is used to access the configuration and is set from a properties object which contains keys of a common format. Configurations can be accessed by their index, too.

Example: The properties object contains the following keys and value to load two configurations. (Every key starts with a common prefix indicated by ... in this example.

 # load this configuration manager to hold the following configurations
 ....class=CSysTheUltimateConfigManager

 # Load this config from an INI file
 ....1.class=CSysConfigINI
 ....1.filename=theConfig.ini
 ....1.priority=2
 ....1.name=SuperDuperConfig

 # Then load this XML style config file
 ....2.class=CSysConfigXML
 ....2.priority=1
 ....2.name=primaryConfiguration
 ....2.filename=aXMLStyleConfig.xml
 ....2.path=../a/path/to/another/directory

The first loaded configuration is always the 'primary' configuration (with index = 0) as long as it is not removed.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Eugen Obermeier

init

public void init(Properties props)
          throws CSysConfigIOException
Load all configurations with the specifications in the given priority object.

Parameters:
props - This object should contain all necessary specifications for the configurations to be loaded.
Throws:
CSysConfigIOException - if a configuration cannot be loaded

add

public void add(ISysConfig config)
         throws CSysConfigFormatException
Inserts the specified configuration at the position determined by the priority of the specified configuration. Appends at the end of this configuration manager, if no priority is defined.

Parameters:
config - a configuration
Throws:
CSysConfigFormatException - if a configuration with this name already exists.

get

public ISysConfig get()
               throws CSysConfigNotFoundException
Returns the primary configuration (at index 0).

Throws:
CSysConfigNotFoundException - if no configuration exists

get

public ISysConfig get(int index)
               throws CSysConfigNotFoundException
Returns the configuration at the given index.

Parameters:
index - the index of the configuration (counting starts at 0)
Throws:
CSysConfigNotFoundException - if index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size()).

get

public ISysConfig get(String name)
               throws CSysConfigNotFoundException
Returns a certain configuration identified by name.

Parameters:
name - Name of the configuration to search for.
Throws:
CSysConfigNotFoundException - if a configuration with this name does not exist.

arrange

public void arrange(ISysConfig config,
                    int priority)
             throws CSysConfigFormatException
Change the priority of the specified configuration to the specified value. Changing the priority will change the position in the configuration manager if there is another configuration with a higher or lower priority.

Parameters:
config - specifies the configuration
priority - the new priority
Throws:
CSysConfigFormatException - if the itegrity of the configuration manager would be broken

remove

public ISysConfig remove(int index)
Removes the element at the specified position in this configuration manager. Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one from their indices). Returns the configuration that was removed from the configuration manager. If no configuration whith this index exists, nothing happens.

Parameters:
index - Index of the configuration to be removed from this configuration manager, if present.
Returns:
The removed configuration or null, if no configuration with this index exists.

remove

public ISysConfig remove(String name)
Removes the configuration with the specified name from this configuration manager. Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one from their indices). If no configuration whith this name exists, nothing happens.

Parameters:
name - Name of the configuration to be removed from this configuration manager, if present.
Returns:
Returns the configuration that was removed from the configuration manager.

remove

public boolean remove(ISysConfig config)
Removes the specified configuration from the configuration manager.

Parameters:
config - the configuration to be removed from this manager, if present.
Returns:
true if the manager contained the specified configuration.

findItem

public ISysConfigItem findItem(String[] fullName)
                        throws CSysItemNotFoundException
Search for an item by its full name (path + name) in all configurations.

Parameters:
fullName - An array with one item name per string.
Returns:
The found item or null if not found.
Throws:
CSysItemNotFoundException - Not thrown!

findItem

public ISysConfigItem findItem(String fullName)
                        throws CSysItemNotFoundException
Search for an item by its full name (path + name) in all configurations. Path is delimited by a certain 'delimiter' (depends on implementation -- slash recommended).

Parameters:
fullName - A string containing the path and name of the item to search for in all configurations delimited by a special character.
Returns:
The found item or null if not found.
Throws:
CSysItemNotFoundException - Not thrown! (Will be removed in version 3-0-0.)

getItems

public Vector getItems(String namepattern,
                       boolean exactMatch)
Search in all configurations for items where the items name matches to the given namepattern.

Parameters:
namepattern - the name to search for
exactMatch - If true only items with exactly (case insensitive) the same name are returned. If false, every item where namepattern is a substring is returned.
Returns:
a list of references to all found items.
